tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE production_efficiency (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  production_date DATE NOT NULL,
  production_time TIME NOT NULL,
  efficiency_rating DECIMAL(4,2),
  bottleneck_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE BottleneckAnalysis (
	analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	process_id INT,
	bottleneck_description TEXT,
	bottleneck_status VARCHAR(50),
	FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES ManufacturingProcess(process_id)
);

CREATE TABLE production_efficiency_analysis (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  production_date DATE,
  production_time TIME,
  efficiency_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE bottleneck_identification (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  bottleneck_type VARCHAR(50),
  bottleneck_description TEXT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE production_line (
    production_line_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    production_date DATE,
    product_id UUID,
    quantity INT,
    efficiency_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE production_errors (
    error_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    production_line_id UUID,
    error_description TEXT,
    error_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    resolved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE production_tasks (
    task_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    production_line_id UUID,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status TEXT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE production_bottlenecks (
    bottleneck_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    production_line_id UUID,
    bottleneck_description TEXT,
    bottleneck_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    resolved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ManufacturingFacilities (
 facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 facility_name TEXT,
 location TEXT,
 production_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionLines (
 line_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 facility_id INT,
 line_name TEXT,
 line_capacity INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES ManufacturingFacilities(facility_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionLogs (
 log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 line_id INT,
 start_time TIMESTAMP,
 end_time TIMESTAMP,
 production_output INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (line_id) REFERENCES ProductionLines(line_id)
)

CREATE TABLE DefectLogs (
 defect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 log_id INT,
 defect_type TEXT,
 defect_description TEXT,
 FOREIGN KEY (log_id) REFERENCES ProductionLogs(log_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
 maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 line_id INT,
 maintenance_type TEXT,
 maintenance_duration INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (line_id) REFERENCES ProductionLines(line_id)
)
